text: Meg Ryan is an iconic American actress who doubles as a producer ; best known for her top - notch performances in films and television series. She came into the limelight following her impressive performance as the lead actress in the romantic comedy titled When Harry Met Sally in 1989. Since then, she has continued to wow her many fans with her exceptional acting prowess. Learn more about her biography, net worth, husband, and other interesting facts below. Meg Ryan Biography The amazing actress was born Margaret Mary Anne Hyra in Connecticut, USA on November 19, 1961. Her mother is a former actress cum English teacher named Susan Jordan, while her father is a maths teacher named Harry Hyra.
